18.description:
Cantarell Energy diseña la integración de complejos sistemas logísticos y comerciales con servicios en la nube para hacer que las empresas almacenadoras, comercializadoras y gasolineras de hidrocarburos interactúen en un ecosistema más conectado, rentable y sostenible.

Brindamos a los clientes un acceso sin precedentes al mercado, las soluciones financieras y la protección comercial que necesitan, tanto mayoristas como consumidores reciben mejores productos y se vuelven más eficientes, sabiendo que sus productos se entregaron de manera responsable y eficiente. Este enfoque simplificado y empoderador está ayudando a eliminar muchos de los costos operativos innecesarios mediante la creación de cadenas de valor agregado real a través de nuestro SaaS.

Actualmente, la compañía está preparando su primera ronda de levantamiento de fondos para impulsar su crecimiento y su impacto positivo en el mundo.

Cantarell Energy designs the integration of complex logistics and commercial systems with cloud services to make storage, trading and hydrocarbon gasoline companies interact in a more connected, profitable and sustainable ecosystem.

Giving customers unprecedented market access, financial solutions and trade protection they need, both wholesalers and consumers get better products and become more efficient, knowing that their products were delivered responsibly and efficiently. This simplified and empowering approach is helping to eliminate many of the necessary operational costs by creating real value-add chains through SaaS.

Currently, the company is preparing its first round of fundraising to boost its growth and its positive impact in the world.

19.founder_identifiers: Jose Luis Monroy, Juan Carlos Monroy

12.short_description: Mexico City-based fintech startup building an AI-powered digital bank with a laser focus on the needs of the underbanked in LatAm.

18.description:
Aviva is building an AI-powered digital bank for Latin America’s underbank communities. 

While determined to fuel Latin America’s ongoing emergence of a new middle class with a fully-fledged portfolio of inclusive financial services, Aviva’s initial go-to-market concentrates on unsecured credit products for individuals and nano-businesses in Mexico.

As most of the underbanked 40+ million Mexicans live in small and medium-sized towns, Aviva builds a bridge to those living in remote communities with its physical onboarding kiosks. These nano-branches provide a documentless 3-minute video onboarding for everyone in need of liquidity. 

Novel AI-based technology, including natural language processing, allows Aviva to match customers’ spoken word to the fields of a comprehensive real-time credit application. Transforming speech to text and inferring emotions and personality from the visual layer of the application video gives Aviva an edge in scoring thin-file customers. Leveraging these novel risk models, Aviva aims to provide the lowest interest rates available to today’s underserved.

19.founder_identifiers: Amran Frey, David Hernandez, Filiberto Castro, Israel Garcia

11.location_identifiers: San Miguel De Tucuman, Tucuman, Argentina

12.short_description: Organic coatings that protect produce from spoilage and decay.

18.description:
At NAT4Bio, we develop naturally-sourced coatings that protect produce from spoilage and decay.

By leveraging microbial fermentation of selected fungi & bacteria and through carefully designed downstream processes, we obtain cell-free compounds, meaning we use microbes' active principles without the microbes themselves. 

Our first product is a natural and edible coating for fresh lemons that could potentially replace the combination of waxes and chemical fungicides.
We are also prototyping formulations for blueberries and avocados, and we aim to expand our portfolio to address the needs of every fruit class.

10.categories: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Electronic Health Record (EHR), Health Care, Health Diagnostics, Home Health Care, Personal Health

12.short_description: Immediate healthcare services and guidance without a medical appointment, based on AI

18.description:
Mediko is transforming how people understand health access with an easy, fast and affordable solution.

While some are still thinking how to have more docs (as Henry Ford said, "people would have asked me for faster horses") we are developing an instant health solution without a medical appointment, driven by AI. In other words, a digital doctor. Within the app users can access medical guidance, tests analysis and interpretation, nutritional advice, manage their health records and more to come.

Mediko's target is people that don't feel satisfied with the slow, costy and limited solution of medical appointments, making them even evade taking care of their health. They lack time and are used to do everything through their phones. Also, this people is willing to control their own health data and record, not depending on a specific health establishment.

Our business strategy stands on a freemium model with monthly subscription to unlimited health services, both for B2C and B2B.

Soon, Mediko will be the standard of digital health. Our vision is to have Mediko at our homescreens for health as Uber for transportation, Netflix for movies or Paypal for payments.
